title: Fix PWA share target upload flow
Improve login user experience
description: Improve the login experience with an inline, guided flow for phone, code, and optional password steps. Replace blocking prompts with status messaging, error handling, and clear feedback while keeping styling consistent with the existing UI.

title: Add PWA share target support for uploads
description: Investigate and implement Web Share Target for the PWA so shared files can be received and piped into existing upload flow.

title: Fix npm ci/build dependency lock mismatch
description: npm ci fails because package-lock.json is out of sync with package.json (picocolors mismatch). Update lockfile/deps so npm ci and parcel build work.
